DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this investigation is to carry out a clinical evaluation of a newly developed fistula pouching system's ability to function as a good pouch for fistulas, with the opening on the skin of the stomach or in a wound on the skin of the stomach.
DOC.brief_title: Feasibility Study of a New Fistula Pouching System
DOC.criteria: 18 years or older Capable of giving informed consent Have to be hospitalized Have a fistula with the opening on the skin in the abdominal area Pregnant and/or breastfeeding Receiving radiation or chemotherapy during the investigation period
